verses.verse: Even to <S%H3117>day<s%> is my <S%H7879>complaint<s%> <S%H4805>bitter<s%>: my <S%H3027>stroke<s%> is <S%H3513>heavier<s%> than my <S%H585>groaning<s%>.
Oh <S%H5414>that<s%> I <S%H3045>knew<s%> where I might <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H935>him<s%>! that I might come even to his <S%H8499>seat<s%>!
I would <S%H6186>order<s%> my <S%H4941>cause<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4390>him<s%>, and fill my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> with <S%H8433>arguments<s%>.
I would <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H4405>words<s%> which he would <S%H6030>answer<s%> <S%H995>me<s%>, and understand what he would say unto <S%H559>me<s%>.
Will he <S%H7378>plead<s%> <S%H5978>against<s%> me with his <S%H7230>great<s%> <S%H3581>power<s%>? <S%H7760>No<s%>; but he would put strength in me.
There the <S%H3477>righteous<s%> might <S%H3198>dispute<s%> with <S%H6403>him<s%>; so should I be delivered for <S%H5331>ever<s%> from my <S%H8199>judge<s%>.
<S%H1980>Behold<s%>, I go <S%H6924>forward<s%>, but he is not <S%H268>there<s%>; and backward, but I cannot perceive <S%H995>him<s%>:
On the left <S%H8040>hand<s%>, where he does <S%H6213>work<s%>, but I cannot <S%H2372>behold<s%> <S%H5848>him<s%>: he hides himself on the right <S%H3225>hand<s%>, that I cannot see <S%H7200>him<s%>:
But he <S%H3045>knows<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> that I <S%H5978>take<s%>: when he has <S%H974>tried<s%> <S%H3318>me<s%>, I shall come forth as <S%H2091>gold<s%>.
My <S%H7272>foot<s%> has <S%H270>held<s%> his <S%H838>steps<s%>, his <S%H1870>way<s%> have I <S%H8104>kept<s%>, and not <S%H5186>declined<s%>.

Neither have I gone <S%H4185>back<s%> from the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> of his <S%H8193>lips<s%>; I have <S%H6845>esteemed<s%> the <S%H561>words<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> more than my necessary <S%H2706>food<s%>.
But he is in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7725>mind<s%>, and who can turn <S%H5315>him<s%>? and what his soul <S%H183>desires<s%>, even that he <S%H6213>does<s%>.
For he <S%H7999>performs<s%> the thing that is <S%H2706>appointed<s%> for <S%H7227>me<s%>: and many such things are with <S%H2007>him<s%>.
Therefore am I <S%H926>troubled<s%> at his <S%H6440>presence<s%>: when I <S%H995>consider<s%>, I am afraid of <S%H6342>him<s%>.
For <S%H410>God<s%> makes my <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H7401>soft<s%>, and the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> troubles <S%H926>me<s%>:
Because I was not cut <S%H6789>off<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H2822>darkness<s%>, neither has he <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H652>darkness<s%> from my <S%H6440>face<s%>.
